mapper.select: SELECT w.wiki_seq, w.wiki_title, wmc.employee_seq, e.employee_num, e.employee_name, wmc.reg_date AS latest_mod_date FROM wiki w JOIN (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY wiki_seq ORDER BY reg_date DESC) AS seq FROM wiki_mod_content ) wmc ON wmc.wiki_seq = w.wiki_seq JOIN employee e ON wmc.employee_seq = e.employee_seq WHERE seq = 1 AND w.wiki_deleted_status = false ORDER BY latest_mod_date DESC

SELECT wm.employee_seq, e.employee_num, e.employee_name, wm.wiki_mod_content_seq, wm.reg_date FROM wiki_mod_content wm JOIN employee e ON wm.employee_seq = e.employee_seq WHERE wm.wiki_seq = #{wiki_seq} ORDER BY reg_date DESC

SELECT w.wiki_seq, w.wiki_title, ws.wiki_snapshot_seq, ws.wiki_snapshot_ver, ws.wiki_snapshot_content FROM wiki w JOIN wiki_snapshot ws ON w.wiki_seq = ws.wiki_seq WHERE w.wiki_seq = #{wiki_seq} AND ws.wiki_snapshot_ver <= (w.wiki_current_ver / 10 + 1)

SELECT wiki_mod_content_seq, wiki_seq, wiki_snapshot_seq, mod_content AS wikiModContent FROM wiki_mod_content WHERE wiki_seq = #{wikiSeq} AND wiki_snapshot_seq = #{wikiSnapshotSeq} ORDER BY wiki_mod_content_seq
SELECT reg_date FROM wiki_mod_content ORDER BY wiki_mod_content_seq DESC LIMIT 1
